artist.name: Joseph Cornell
artist.description: Surrealist sculptor and collagist. Fantastic diarama artist

artist.name: James Turrell
artist.description: California Light and Space artist. Made my favorite artwork in NYC ('Meeting', at PS1)

artist.name: Francisco de Goya y Luciente
artist.description: Spanish painter and printmaker. Subtly parodied the royalty as a court painter. Documented the horrors of the Napoleonic Wars in his etchings. Found the darker side of human Life.
